text: White Youth is a 1920 American silent drama movie directed by Norman Dawn and starring Edith Roberts, Phyllis Allen, Alfred Hollingsworth, Thomas Jefferson, Hattie Peters. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * Category:1920 drama movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Norman Dawn
title: White Youth
